code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionsTypes";import axios from"../../axios-orders";export var addIngredient=function addIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var removeIngredient=function removeIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var setIngredients=function setIngredients(ingredients){return{type:actionTypes.SET_INGREDIENTS,ingredients:ingredients};};export var fetchIngredientsFailed=function fetchIngredientsFailed(){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED};};export var initIngredients=function initIngredients(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://react-my-burger-20142-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/ingredients.json").then(function(response){dispatch(setIngredients(response.data));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchIngredientsFailed());});};};
